select
distinct
id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier,
from cust_base_info
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update cust_base_info
gmt_modified = #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = now(),
modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
depart_id = #{record.departId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category = #{record.category,jdbcType=CHAR},

update cust_base_info set gmt_modified = now(), modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, depart_id = #{record.departId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category = #{record.category,jdbcType=CHAR}, cust_no = #{record.custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_name = #{record.certName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_type = #{record.certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_no = #{record.certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay_account = #{record.alipayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{record.detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_source = #{record.custSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, cust_manager_id = #{record.custManagerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, contact = #{record.contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_confirm = #{record.certConfirm,jdbcType=CHAR}, regist_channel = #{record.registChannel,jdbcType=CHAR}, version = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_credited = #{record.isCredited,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update cust_base_info
gmt_modified = #gmtModified#,
gmt_modified = now(),
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
depart_id = #{departId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category = #{category,jdbcType=CHAR},
cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cert_name = #{certName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

cert_no = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alipay_account = #{alipayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_source = #{custSource,jdbcType=CHAR},
cust_manager_id = #{custManagerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cert_confirm = #{certConfirm,jdbcType=CHAR},
regist_channel = #{registChannel,jdbcType=CHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_credited = #{isCredited,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cust_base_info set gmt_modified = now(), modifier = #{modifier}, org_id = #{orgId}, depart_id = #{departId}, category = #{category}, cust_no = #{custNo}, cert_name = #{certName}, cert_type = #{certType}, cert_no = #{certNo}, alipay_account = #{alipayAccount}, detail = #{detail}, cust_source = #{custSource}, cust_manager_id = #{custManagerId}, contact = #{contact}, cert_confirm = #{certConfirm}, regist_channel = #{registChannel}, version = #{version}, remark = #{remark}, is_delete = #{isDelete}, is_credited = #{isCredited} where id = #{id}
